title: A.Merry.Friggin.Christmas.2014.1080p.BrRip.6CH.x265.HEVC-PSA
description:
Full release name:
A.Merry.Friggin.Christmas.2014.1080p.BrRip.6CH.x265.HEVC-PSA



Release notes:
- Ripped from original BluRay
- Has 2CH audio
- Sample included, so check it out before you download


*** IMPORTANT - READ BEFORE YOU DOWNLOAD ***

If you're not familiar with my x265 releases, please download the sample before you download the whole thing. This is a new HQ codec, which brought stunning video quality but it probably won't be played on your old smart TV or BluRay Player. Though I played it fine with MX player on my android device.

If you want to play it on your PC, you can easily use VLC, MPC-HC, GOM Player or any other modern media player. just be sure you got the latest version of them.
If you have no video and only the audio is playing, try to update your player or use another one. Installing LAV Filters may help.


If you want to read more about the codec, check this out:
                           <a href="
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11022227/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/11022227/</a>


This is nothing you can compare with x264 releases so Don't let the size scare you. small sizes don't always mean LOW QUALITIES. This is the best you can get in this size.

Check screenshots then download it and Enjoy. You'll LOVE IT!

This is THE future!



** Special thanks to all the seeders. you are all part of this :) **
